document.docAuthor: Coronato-Ribeiro, Amanda, Pinto-Da-Rocha, Ricardo & Rheims, Cristina Anne
document.masterDocTitle: Catalogue of Opiliones (Arachnida) types deposited in the Arachnida and Myriapoda collection of the Instituto Butantan, São Paulo, Brazil

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Catalogue of Opiliones (Arachnida) types deposited in the Arachnida and Myriapoda collection of the Instituto Butantan, São Paulo, Brazil

subSubSection.paragraph:
58 .
Acanthopachyloides patellaris Piza, 1942
a. Syntypes 23 2 Ƥ; type locality: Chile (no detailed locality) (ex MZLQ / IBSP 10085 ,
Figs 6
F–G). Junior synonym of
Pachylus chilensis (Gray, 1833 )
(see Soares 1944 c). Available .

59 .
Anoplogynus nasutus Piza, 1938
c. Syntypes 43 2 Ƥ; type locality: Piracicaba, São Paulo State, Brazil (ex MZLQ A0018 / IBSP 10093 ,
Figs 6
H–I). The type vial contains 53 3 Ƥ of the species, with the two additional specimens to be considered as syntypes according to the International code of Zoological Nomenclature ( 1999 ) Art. 72. 4 . 1.1 . Available .

60 .
Cercopachylus fragilis Piza, 1943
a. Paratype 1 Ƥ; locality: São Paulo, São Paulo State, Brazil (ex MZLQ A0044 / IBSP 10096 ,
Fig. 7
A). Junior synonym of
Uropachylus ypiranga (Mello-Leitão, 1922 )
(see Soares 1943 b). Available .

61 .
Discocyrtulosoma soaresi Piza, 1943
a. Paratype 13 ; type locality: Serra da Cantareira, São Paulo State, Brazil (ex MZLQ A0124 / IBSP 10086 ,
Fig. 7
B). Junior synonym of
Discocyrtus cornutus Piza, 1940
b (see Soares 1944 e). Available .

62 .
Discocyrtus areolatus Piza, 1938
b. Holotype 3 ; type locality: Ipiranga, São Paulo State, Brazil (MZLQ). Not available .

63 .
Discocyrtus dualis Piza, 1943
b. Syntypes 13 1 Ƥ; type locality: Mogi-Guaçu, São Paulo State, Brazil (MZLQ). Junior synonym of
Discocyrtus latus Mello-Leitão, 1935
a (see Soares 1944 c). Not available .

64 .
Discocyrtus elegantulus Mello-Leitão, 1939
. Syntypes 13 1 Ƥ; type locality: unknown (IBSP 94 ). Not available .

65 .
Discocyrtus fimbriatus Mello-Leitão, 1939
. Holotype 3 ; type locality: Santa Catarina State, Brazil (IBSP 84 ). Not available .

66 .
Discocyrtus invalidus Piza, 1938
c. Holotype 3 ; type locality: Matão, São Paulo State, Brazil (ex MZLQ A0024 / IBSP 10103 ). Available .

67 .
Discocyrtus latus Mello-Leitão, 1935
a. Syntypes 23 ; type locality: Guaianás, São Paulo State, Brazil (IBSP 2 ). Not available .

68 .
Discocyrtus pectinifemur Mello-Leitão, 1937
b. Holotype 3 ; type locality: Cabrália, São Paulo State, Brazil (IBSP 42 ,
Fig. 7
C). Available .

69 .
Discocyrtus pertenuis Mello-Leitão 1935
a. Holotype 3 ; type locality: Guianás, São Paulo State, Brazil (IBSP 1 ). Not available .

70 .
Eusarcus caparaoensis Hara
& Pinto-da-Rocha, 2010 . Holotype 3 (IBSP 2904 ,
Fig. 7
D), Paratypes 1 Ƥ (IBSP 2895 ), 1 Ƥ (IBSP 2903 ,
Fig. 7
E); type locality: Alto Caparaó (Parque Nacional Caparaó), Minas Gerais State, Brazil . Available .

71 .
Eusarcus cavernicola Hara
& Pinto-da-Rocha, 2010 . Paratypes 13 1 Ƥ (IBSP 1288 ), 1 Ƥ (IBSP 1289 ), 23 (IBSP 1286 ), 23 1 Ƥ (IBSP 1298 ), 13 3 Ƥ (IBSP 1299 ); locality: Parque Estadual Terra Ronca, Lapa da Angélica, Goiás State, Brazil . Paratypes 13 (IBSP 1293 ), 13 (IBSP 1296 ), 13 (IBSP 1297 ), 13 2 Ƥ (IBSP 1301 ), 33 1 Ƥ (IBSP 1300 ,
Fig. 7
F), 43 (IBSP 1302 ), 1 Ƥ (IBSP 1287 ,
Fig. 7
G), 13 (IBSP 1290 ), 1 Ƥ (IBSP 1294 ), 1 Ƥ (IBSP 1295 ); locality: Parque Estadual Terra Ronca, Lapa do Passa Três, Goiás State, Brazil . Available (except for IBSP 1295 ).

72 .
Eusarcus didactylus Hara
& Pinto-da-Rocha, 2010 . Holotype 3 (IBSP 2032 b), Paratypes 1 Ƥ (IBSP 2014 ), 1 Ƥ (IBSP 2187 ); type locality: Parque Nacional Serra dos Órgãos, Teresópolis, Rio de Janeiro State, Brazil . Available .

73 .
Eusarcus sergipanus Hara
& Pinto-da-Rocha, 2010 . Holotype 3 ; type locality: Parque Nacional de Itabaiana, Itabaiana, Sergipe State, Brazil (IBSP 1750 ). Not available .

74 .
Giupponia chagasi Pérez & Kury, 2002
. Paratype 1 Ƥ; locality: Serra do Ramalho, Carinhanha, Bahia State, Brazil (IBSP). Available .

75 .
Guaranilia nigrosulcata Mello-Leitão, 1937
a. Holotype 3 ; type locality: Sengés, Paraná State, Brazil (IBSP 72 ,
Fig. 7
H). Currently in
Guaraniticus Mello-Leitão, 1933 (Soares & Soares 1954 )
. Available .

76 .
Jacarepaguana pectinifemur Piza, 1943
b. Holotype 3 ; type locality: Pirassununga, São Paulo State, Brazil (ex MZLQ A0045 / IBSP 10104 ,
Fig.
7
I) Currently in
Metagraphinotus Mello-Leitão, 1927
a (see Soares 1966 ). Available .

77 .
Japyra regularis Mello-Leitão, 1934
. Holotype 3 ; type locality: Japira, Paraná State, Brazil (IBSP 7 ,
Fig. 8
A). Junior synonym of
Uropachylus ypiranga (Mello-Leitão, 1922 )
(see Soares 1943 b). Available .

78 .
Melloleitanius barretensis Piza, 1938
c. Holotype 3 ; type locality: Barretos, São Paulo State, Brazil (ex MZLQ A0016 / IBSP 10083 ,
Fig. 8
B). Junior synonym of
Yraguara annulipes Mello-Leitão, 1937
b (see Piza 1947 ). Available .

79 .
Pachyloides taurus Mello-Leitão, 1937
a. Syntypes 13 3 Ƥ; type locality: Santa Maria, Rio Grande do Sul State, Brazil (IBSP 78 ,
Figs 8
C–D). Available .

80 .
Parabristoweia maculipalpi Piza, 1938
b. Holotype 3 ; type locality: Ipiranga, São Paulo State, Brazil (ex MZLQ A0017 / IBSP 10099 ,
Fig. 8
E). Currently in
Hypophyllonomus Giltay, 1928
(see Soares 1944 b). Available .

81 .
Tabatinguera insignis Mello-Leitão, 1935
b. Paratype 13 ; type locality: Mato Grosso State, Brazil (IBSP 53 ,
Fig. 8
F). Junior synonym of
Parapachyloides armatus (Mello-Leitão, 1931 )
(see Soares 1944 d). Available . 82 .
Yraguara annulipes Mello-Leitão, 1937
b. Syntypes 63 3 Ƥ; type locality: Araguari, Minas Gerais State, Brazil (IBSP 63 ,
Fig. 8
G). Available .
